_header: Gladeth thou Queen of Scottish region
Title(s): A compliment to Queen Margaret, c. 1506
Subjects: Margaret, queen of Scotland; occasional verse
_description: William Dunbar, A compliment to Queen Margaret, c. 1506 — five eight-line stanzas with refrain: ‘Gladethe thoue Queyne of Scotish regioun‘

AbeSeis2.First Lines:
Gladethe thoue queyne of Scottis regiounȝing tendir plaunt of
                    plesand pulcritude…
AbeSeis2.Last Lines:
…fair gem of joy mergreit of þe I meynegladethe þoue
                    queyne of Scottis Regioun
AbeSeis2.Note:
Same page as 4495, below
                    which is written ‘quod Dunbar’.
